description: A story about an old snowman's transformation.
title: The Last Snowman
n_1: Oliver, the snowman, stands proudly in the melting snow.
n_2: Lily the Sun shines brightly, warming the day.
n_3: Oliver starts to melt, slowly turning into water.
n_4: Oliver completely melts away, leaving a small puddle.
c1_4: I guess I am water now.
c2_4: And you'll be part of many new lives.
